name: Rotisserie Chicken Noodle Soup
author: Michelle Molina
summary: A hearty chicken noodle soup perfect for a cold day or a sick little one.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
4 cups chicken broth, or to taste
1  cooked rotisserie chicken - skinned, boned, and meat shredded
directions: Coat the bottom of a Dutch oven with olive oil
Add carrots, celery, onion, oregano, Italian seasoning, seasoned salt, salt, and pepper
Saute over medium-high heat until vegetables have softened, 6 to 8 minutes
Add garlic and cook until onion is translucent and garlic scent has lessened slightly, about 4 to 5 minutes
Add chicken broth and bring to a boil
Add egg noodles; cook 5 to 6 minutes
Gently stir in shredded chicken and simmer until egg noodles are tender and chicken is heated through, 2 to 3 more minutes
